mapper.select:
select count(*) from business_order
where BUSINESS_NO like concat('%',${no},'%')
mapper.sql: ID, STATUS, BUSINESS_NO, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_INFO, UNIT_PRICE, BUY_NUM, TOTAL_PRICE, PAY_TYPE, E_ID, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from business_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into business_order (ID, STATUS, BUSINESS_NO, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_INFO, UNIT_PRICE, BUY_NUM, TOTAL_PRICE, PAY_TYPE, E_ID, CREATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE})

PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
